name: Encoder
desc: A type that can encode values into a native format for external representation.

items.name: var codingPath: [CodingKey]
items.desc: The path of coding keys taken to get to this point in encoding.

items.name: var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : Any]
items.desc: Any contextual information set by the user for encoding.

items.name: func container<Key>(keyedBy: Key.Type) -> KeyedEncodingContainer<Key>
items.desc: Returns an encoding container appropriate for holding multiple values keyed by the given key type.

items.name: func singleValueContainer() -> SingleValueEncodingContainer
items.desc: Returns an encoding container appropriate for holding a single primitive value.

items.name: func unkeyedContainer() -> UnkeyedEncodingContainer
items.desc: Returns an encoding container appropriate for holding multiple unkeyed values.
